name: Bureau Brussels Consulting
goal:
The team at Bureau Brussels helps in managing key relationships in the regulatory process by:
scanning the horizon, drafting an agenda,
building issue-driven alliances, positioning executives in key networks, and thus assisting in maintaining the licence to operate.
interests: Banking and financial services, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Public Health, Single market, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: Energy Taxation Directive, Consumer Credit Directive, Long-term EU greenhouse gas emissions reductions, Charges on cross-border payments and currency conversion charges
